name: Tales From The Dancing Moon (itch)
description:
Demo now Available!

Tales from the Dancing Moon is now available to try in it's early stages of development.

The purpose of this demo is to give you an early look of the game. But also to test the framework, catch any early bugs and get a sense of the current gameplay loop to help enforce the foundation in which the full game will be built upon. There are minor story elements but will mainly focus on gameplay mechanics.

Here's what to expect from the Demo:

  • A few character customization options.
  • 1 Town Zone.
  • 1 Procedural Generation Zone.
  • 1 Season.
  • A few interactable NPCs.
  • A few scripted quests.
  • A few types of procedural quests.
  • A small amount of craft items.
  • Item placement features.
  • Basic market and shopping.
  • Basic Farming and Fishing.
  • Basic Combat.
  • Photo Mode.
  • Minor lore books.
  • Misc supporting gameplay mechanics.
↓  Scroll down the page to find the download links.  ↓ Community



Welcome

Tales from the Dancing Moon is a single player video game inspired by my favourite life-simulation games such as Stardew Valley and Animal Crossing and mixes it up in a 3D isometric RPG aesthetic inspired by games like Pillars of Eternity and Baldur's Gate.

Designed to be a casual title for anyone interested in classic-RPGs that focusses more on gameplay such as questing, NPC interaction, resource gathering, crafting, and building.

An an indie game, the story will be relatively short compared to other 'epic' titles in the same genre, but gameplay can continue by it’s sandbox nature.

Inspiration Synopsis

You wake up to find yourself in a strange world. A local Innkeeper finds you and helps you make your way to the nearby village of Illisor – a ruined place that’s recovering from a recent attack of deadly shadow-beasts.

You spend your time at The Dancing Moon Inn where you assist the citizens in rebuilding their village. During your stay you discover that you weren’t the only stranger passing through this village recently. You begin to follow in the footsteps of those who came before in the hope of finding a way back home whilst discovering the mysterious past of Illisor…

Gameplay Story
Explore the hidden mysteries of the town of  Illisor, starting from The Dancing Moon Inn. Meet interesting characters along the way who give you intriguing quests. Be You

Flexible character customisation allows you to be whoever you want to be.

Time & Seasons
Wake up each day to a slightly different feel to the air with progressive time, weather and seasons. Craft & Building
A robust building system allows you to craft and place furniture just about anywhere in the village. Allowing you to furnish your own residence and decorate the area. Proc-Gen Exploration
Venture outside the town to explore randomly generated zones where you can gather resources, discover mysteries and combat enemies. Photo Mode
Unlock the isometric camera and take captivating photographs using different lens and filter options. Extras Relaxing Playlist Soundtrack
